title: 论坛快被玩坏了
author: 爱拍、小少
txt_content:
感觉论坛被一些人玩坏了，图证：












表示无语
又水了一下

replies.author: rainsojey
replies.txt_content: 哇。好厉害啊！怎么弄的（咳咳）

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content: 这是几个月前做的

replies.author: gyki123
replies.txt_content: 于是你就水了一帖？[water]

replies.author: Monn_Dik
replies.txt_content:
审核元素这种东西都玩腻了…
而且…Water is a bad habit

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content: 审查元素呗，我也快玩腻了

replies.author: gopnik
replies.txt_content: 于是你就用F12水了一帖?

replies.author: xiaoxiaokulipa
replies.txt_content: 这是P图P出来的吗？

replies.author: SuperXingYu
replies.txt_content: 然这是审查元素做的
怎么玩 那里有教程贴？
怎么玩 那里有教程贴？{:10_492:}

replies.author: 琅梵
replies.txt_content: 你能告诉我 这有什么用么

replies.author: 昔年哥哥
replies.txt_content: 真好玩的样子。。

replies.author: Big_雨熙
replies.txt_content: 审核元素而已- -

replies.author: zhangyu40177
replies.txt_content: 然而并没有卵用-

replies.author: GodLion
replies.txt_content:
ItIsEnderman 发表于 2016-1-21 12:33
这是几个月前做的
于是我愣了半个小时。。

replies.author: adou229
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 爱拍、小少
replies.txt_content:
adou229 发表于 2016-1-21 15:55
用psp的吧
额·······
审查元素就可以，还p图，诶我去

replies.author: Keterbrine_
replies.txt_content: 审核元素鉴定完毕，然而并没有什么用_(:зゝ∠)_

replies.author: 灬xiaozhu灬
replies.txt_content: 我知道审查元素这个东西，但是怎么弄的啊。。

replies.author: ESCesc
replies.txt_content: 图片挂了，让我看啥！

replies.author: sssoommin
replies.txt_content: 太简单了F12改本地网页然后截图装逼，我还把我的mc吧的等级改为NHIM的呢

replies.author: 小宇lalala
replies.txt_content: 刚刚做的
因为放假了 ..

replies.author: mgzic
replies.txt_content: p出来的吧？
你们这样玩论坛真的好吗？
